original_title: Royal take big first innings lead, 33/2 in second innings
original_body_lines: S. Thomas' College were bowled out for 153 in their first innings of the 144th Battle of the Blues, with Royal College carrying forward a 173-run lead.
That lead was extended by a further 34 runs after 10 overs of Royal College's second innings. ,
Bulan Weeratunga was the pick of the bowlers for Royal College taking 3 for 26, with Ranuka, Sandesh and Sineth taking two wicekts a piece.
S. Thomas' College 153 in 55 overs (Senadhi Bulankulama 40, Mahith Perera 30, Nathan Caldera 20, Bulan Weeratunga 3/26m sandesh Ramanayake 2/36, Ranuka Malaviarachchi 2/39, Sineth Jayawardena 2/9)
